/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from "react"; import {useLanguage,LanguageContext} from "./context" import { createContext,useContext } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap"; export default function Navbar({children}) { const {language,changeLanguage,word}=useContext(LanguageContext); const handleLang=(e)=>{ changeLanguage(e.target.innerHTML) } return ( word.map(item=>
  • {item.home}
  • Events
  • About Us
  • Contact Us
  • Language
    • فارسی
    • English
) ); }
